IS_TEST().details: A flag to indicate that this is a test contract.

failed().details: Checks whether any test has failed so far. In addition to the local failure flag, we look for the global flag in the HEVM contract at storage slot "faled", because it is possible to run assertions between different instances of PRBTest. See https://github.com/dapphub/dapptools/issues/768.

params._rootHistoryExpiry: The new root history expiry for OpWorldID and PolygonWorldID

params.newOwner: the new owner of the contract
The new owner of the StateBridge contract (foundry fuzz)
The new owner of the StateBridge contract (foundry fuzz)
params.nonOwner: An address that is not the owner of the StateBridge contract

params._rootHistoryExpiry: The new root history expiry for OpWorldID and PolygonWorldID

params.isLocal: Whether the ownership transfer is local (Optimism EOA/contract) or an Ethereum EOA or contract
params.newOwner: The new owner of the OPWorldID contract (foundry fuzz)
the new owner of the contract

opCrossDomainMessengerAddress().notice: address for OP Stack chain Ethereum mainnet L1CrossDomainMessenger contract

opWorldIDAddress().notice: The address of the OpWorldID contract on any OP Stack chain

test_cannotInitializeConstructorWithZero.notice: Tests that the StateBridge constructor params can't be set to the zero address

test_notOwner_SetRootHistoryExpiry_rever.notice: tests whether the StateBridge contract can set root history expiry on Optimism and Polygon

test_notOwner_acceptOwnership_reverts(ad.notice: Tests that a nonPendingOwner can't accept ownership of StateBridge

test_notOwner_transferOwnershipOp_revert.notice: tests that the StateBridge contract's ownership can't be changed by a non-owner

test_notOwner_transferOwnership_reverts(.notice: tests that the StateBridge contract's ownership can't be changed by a non-owner

test_owner_renounceOwnership_reverts().notice: Tests that ownership can't be renounced

test_owner_setGasLimitPropagateRoot_succ.notice: tests whether the StateBridge contract can set the opGasLimit for sendRootOptimism

test_owner_setGasLimitSetRootHistoryExpi.notice: tests whether the StateBridge contract can set the opGasLimit for SetRootHistoryExpirytimism

test_owner_setGasLimitTransferOwnershipO.notice: tests whether the StateBridge contract can set the opGasLimit for transferOwnershipOptimism

test_owner_setRootHistoryExpiry_succeeds.notice: tests whether the StateBridge contract can set root history expiry on Optimism and Polygon

test_owner_transferOwnershipOp_succeeds(.notice: tests whether the StateBridge contract can transfer ownership of the OPWorldID contract

test_owner_transferOwnershipOp_toZeroAdd.notice: tests that the StateBridge contract's ownership can't be set to be the zero address

test_owner_transferOwnership_succeeds(ad.notice: Tests that the owner of the StateBridge contract can transfer ownership using Ownable2Step transferOwnership

test_setGasLimitToZero_reverts().notice: Tests that the StateBridge contract can't set the opGasLimit for sendRootOptimism to 0
